Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please note that the Saturday football registration form link is not allowing you access to register for the programme. If you wish to do so please click below. Please note there are limited places and students previously enrolled will receive priority. Iâ€™m very sorry for any inconvenience caused.
